extDescription.message: Customize your Shkolo experience with ShkoloTweaks! Dark mode, Custom widgets, Cool Stats, and more!

FooterDisclaimer.message: ShkoloTweaks was created by ITPG Students and is software not affiliated with or endorsed by Shkolo.bg.

FetchScheduleError.message:
An error occurred while fetching the schedule data.
Try again by clinking the refresh button.

If the problem persists, please contact the developer.

StatsLTOPopup.message:
This is the number of times you've opened the
Shkolo Dashboard since you've installed ShkoloTweaks.
Note: This number is stored locally you may lose it if you clear your browser data.

CountdownTitle.message: {{DAYS}} days until the end of the school year

CountdownFooter.message: This statistic does NOT include holidays

auto_refresh_description.message: Auto-refresh the page when settings are changed

schedule_widget_description.message: Show the schedule widget on the dashboard

control_tests_widget_description.message: Show the control tests widget on the dashboard

yearCountdown_description.message: Show the year countdown widget on the dashboard

statsPanel_description.message: Show statistics that Shkolo Tweaks collects in Shkolo's statistics page

devTools_description.message: Show debug information and tools in the app

coloredIcons_description.message: Use colored icons instead of monochrome ones

disclaimer_settings_reload.message: Some settings may require a page reload to take effect. [Reload]

noAvatars_description.message: Hide user avatars in the Shkolo interface

NoUpcomingTests.message: Opps... There are no upcoming tests.

NoScheduleData.message: Opps... There is no schedule data for this day.

inAppExtSettings_description.message: Add extension settings inside the profile page

trustedDevicesLogins_description.message: Save/mark known device models and browsers

monGradesAverage_description.message: Adds a row with the average grades in the MON grades table

monSideNavbar_description.message: Moves the navigation bar from the top to the sidebar in MON

disableThemeSync_description.message: Prevent ShkoloTweaks from  syncing the active theme or custom themes to Chrome sync.

leaderboard_description.message: Enable leaderboard to compare results with others. Disclaimer: This enables a leaderboard extension that can submit your success, feedbackcount, pupil_id and school name to a NON-Shkolo server, and the information will be publicly accessible.

monGradesTermAverages_description.message: Adds athe term averages in the term columns

monRoundedAverages_description.message: Show rounded averages instead of precise ones

subSettingsSectionMain_description.message: Show the main settings section separator in the settings page

subSettingsSectionQol_description.message: Show the QoL settings section separator in the settings page

subSettingsSectionExperimental_descripti.message: Show the Experimental settings section separator in the settings page

subSettingsSectionMon_description.message: Show the MON settings section separator in the settings page

subSettingsSectionDev_description.message: Show the Developer settings section separator in the settings page

removeStatisticsButton_description.message: Removes the 'Remove Statistics' button from the dashboard

removeRankDisclaimer_description.message: Removes the rank disclaimer from the ranks widget on the dashboard

removeMobileAppBadges_description.message: Removes the mobile app download badges from the dashboard

removeHelpLink_description.message: Removes the help link from the sidebar menu

showDataProfilePicture_description.message: Show Detailed Dates in Profile Pictures page

schedule_teacher_name_description.message: Display the teacher's name in the schedule widget

schedule_room_number_description.message: Display the room number in the schedule widget

animations_description.message: Enable smooth animations for various UI elements
